Articles.Content: Right, so now that I have Tosh's Carts installed, I need to somehow launch it to the Mun. Now the task for you: how to build a capsule for it? I have NovaPunch tools for it, just help me make a home for my rover.
I have done this with Novapunch and the Crewtank part...
Why not raise the landing gear Dr. Zoidburg ask's?! Drive your whole rocket around without detaching it why don't you!!??? WHOOOPWHOOOOOOOPPWHOOOOOPPWHOOOPWHOOOPWHOOOOP.
I never built a home for my Mun rover I just stuck it directly to the command capsule and stuck the propane tanks and thrusters to it for landing.

You can use the DEMV MARK-1

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/20286-PLUGIN-PART-0-17-BobCat-Ind-Release-DEMV

Edited September 29, 2012 by mrrpamplemousse
I want to go to the Mun using Mechjeb, Vanilla, Novapunch and DEMV! Can anyone provide me with a .craft file to get me to the moon and back using Vanilla, DEMV, And Mechjeb?

I want to go to the Mun using Mechjeb, Vanilla, Novapunch and DEMV! Can anyone provide me with a .craft file to get me to the moon and back using Vanilla, DEMV, And Mechjeb?

Why don't you try building a rocket yourself? I mean, that's half the game right there...
Use the dragon rider capsule + the PLF KW pack
How am I supposed to get the DEMV to pretty much anywhere outside of orbiting and get back to Kerbin?

I use a simple and straightforward capsule on a cart idea

This is the rocket in the VAB..... note the large number of structs

http://cloud-2.steampowered.com/ugc/1135162003835902811/8DA2A98BA6481C883896BDFA06739A674B98704E/

And this is the capsule back on Kerbin after a quick test launch to make sure the concept worked

http://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/1135162003821380439/CFF0DAE9263F2847271295CA55CC271E6C5B914D/

In the event of a real mun landing, the upper stage is released about a second before touch down and then flies off for crash

The landing legs are there to stablish the touchdown if you are on a slope or rough ground

Of course theres no way home for our intrepid explorers, but replacing the cart with a crew tank soon solves that problem.

Boris

And of course, with different 3rd stage engines, it can get to other planets too

How am I supposed to get the DEMV to pretty much anywhere outside of orbiting and get back to Kerbin?
Use the docking mod, and attach one to your lander, and another to the DEMV. When you're landed, just undock the DEMV and float the crew in, and then do the opposite once you're done. Take off as normal.
